songs.title: That Shit U On
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
“Yo
It’s your favorite Killa
Bringing you some old school flava with my homie Blaze
Ladies and gentlemen, boys and girls before we get started in this bitch
Who got the weed?”

[Verse 1: Anybody Killa]
Once again it’s Killa the Incredible
Cologne sick like a bag full of medical
Weedhead stroll as I float on the scene
Because I’m quick to (JUMP!) make ’em jump (JUMP!) with my mac daddy green
I got the party favors, we come in different flavors
Anything you want, just call us the good time savers
I think I got what you need
A little hip inside your hah, hey it worked for me
Besides that, if you can’t hang don’t stare at my cuffs
Being a drag in the room just slouchin it up
We keep it goin cause we can’t stop, party till the break of dawn
Everybody wondering what ABK and Blaze is on

[Hook]
Let me get some of that shit you on (blaze up)
How can we get some of what you on? (it’s the killa) [x4]

[Verse 2: Blaze Ya Dead Homie]
I’m just tryna smoke good like you, that shit you on
I just want to have my cake and eat my ice cream too
Maybe a 40 or two, or ten, can’t get enough
Don’t know what you want but it’s got me finna cuff
Smell that grub it’s sweet like the CK be
Like they grow it in a leaf, made it for Killa and me
I just gotta get some of that shit you on
Load a bong, take a rip, suck a trick real quick
“Hey” (“What’s up man”)
“Hey man” (“Hey man back up dawg”)
“What you smokin on man?” (“What the fuck’s it look like I’m smokin on?”)
“I smell it baby let me ???” (“Man, you better get – man you ain’t even throw shit on it”)
“Aww, come on man” (“Back up man, you bout to make the needle jump”)
“I got to get some of that shit you on” (No,  the fuck why?”)
“Cause it’s the muthafuckin bomb man”

[Hook]

[Verse 3: Anybody Killa]
I got the killa box, super dicky, helly buzz
Biggest one there ever was, got me seein double, cuz
Man I love how it feel
When I release the weed smoke it get me chokin for real (it’s the killa)
Go ahead and blaze it up
Be the center of attention act a fool and stuff
Foo dang the night away to your favorite song
And keep the people at the party askin “What you on?”

[Hook x2]
